explains: adj. <非正式>怪异的，令人毛骨悚然的；爬行的

sentences.en: As soon as you get them, you get loads of creepy guys.
sentences.cn: 一旦你得到他们，你就得到许多令人毛骨悚然的家伙。

sentences.en: There are creepy-crawly sensations, like insects crawling beneath the skin.
sentences.cn: 有令人毛骨悚然的感觉，像昆虫在皮肤下蠕动。

sentences.en: There are creepy-crawly sensations, like insects crawling beneath the skin.
sentences.cn: 有令人毛骨悚然的感觉，像昆虫在皮肤下蠕动。
